faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions below.
faq.q1.question: Is 123LegalDoc a law firm?
faq.q1.answer: No, 123LegalDoc is a software platform that provides AI-powered document generation tools. We are not a law firm and do not provide legal advice. Our service is not a substitute for the advice of an attorney.
faq.q2.question: Are the documents legally binding?
faq.q2.answer: Our templates are attorney-reviewed and designed to be legally sound when filled out correctly for common situations. However, the specific requirements for legal validity can vary by jurisdiction and the specifics of your situation. We always recommend consulting with a qualified attorney for complex matters or if you have any doubts.
faq.q3.question: How does the AI help create documents?
faq.q3.answer: Our AI helps in two main ways: 1) It can infer the type of document you might need based on your description of a situation. 2) During the questionnaire, it can help tailor clauses and ensure the document is customized to the information you provide. It does not provide legal advice.
faq.q4.question: Can I use these documents in any U.S. state?
faq.q4.answer: Many of our documents are designed for general use across all U.S. states. However, some documents may have state-specific versions or clauses. Our system will guide you if state-specific information is required. Always verify the requirements for your specific jurisdiction.
faq.q5.question: What if I need to make changes after generating a document?
faq.q5.answer: After generating your document, you will typically have an option to review and edit it before finalizing. For significant changes or complex situations, consulting an attorney is recommended.
faq.q6.question: Is my information secure?
faq.q6.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. We use encryption and follow industry best practices to protect your information. Please review our Privacy Policy for more details.
